LanguageData.PowerConduit.label: power conduit
LanguageData.PowerConduit.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings。
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Blueprint.label: power conduit (blueprint)
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Frame.label: power conduit (building)
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Frame.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings。
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit.label: heavy power conduit
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit.description: A set of heavy electrical cables for moving power around. They are very strong and non-flammable。
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Blueprint.label: heavy power conduit (blueprint)
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Frame.label: heavy power conduit (building)
LanguageData.HeavyPowerConduit_Frame.description: A set of heavy electrical cables for moving power around. They are very strong and non-flammable。
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible.label: hidden power conduit
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. This one is hidden in the ground。
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Blueprint.label: hidden power conduit (blueprint)
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Frame.label: hidden power conduit (building)
LanguageData.PowerConduitInvisible_Frame.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. This one is hidden in the ground。
LanguageData.PowerSwitch.label: power switch
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Blueprint.label: power switch (blueprint)
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Blueprint_Install.label: power switch (blueprint)
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Frame.label: power switch (building)
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker.label: power switch flicker
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker_Blueprint.label: power switch flicker (blueprint)
LanguageData.PowerSwitchFlicker_Frame.label: power switch flicker (building)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch.label: scheduled switch
LanguageData.TimerSwitch.description: Switches power on/off based on the time of day。
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Blueprint.label: scheduled switch (blueprint)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Blueprint_Install.label: scheduled switch (blueprint)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Frame.label: scheduled switch (building)
LanguageData.TimerSwitch_Frame.description: Switches power on/off based on the time of day。
LanguageData.Battery.label: battery
LanguageData.Battery.description: Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 1,000 W。
LanguageData.Battery_Blueprint.label: battery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Battery_Blueprint_Install.label: battery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Battery_Frame.label: battery (building)
LanguageData.Battery_Frame.description: Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 1,000 W。
LanguageData.FissionBattery.label: fission battery
LanguageData.FissionBattery.description: Stores electricity and recycles charge using fission processes. Slightly more efficient than standard batteries. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 4,000 W。
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Blueprint.label: fission battery (blueprint)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Blueprint_Install.label: fission battery (blueprint)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Frame.label: fission battery (building)
LanguageData.FissionBattery_Frame.description: Stores electricity and recycles charge using fission processes. Slightly more efficient than standard batteries. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet. Holds up to 4,000 W。
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.label: solar generator
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.description: \n\n产出：electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark。
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Blueprint.label: solar generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Frame.label: solar generator (building)
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Frame.description: \n\n产出：electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark。
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator.label: advanced solar generator
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator.description: \n\n产出：electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark。
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Blueprint.label: advanced solar generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.label: advanced solar generator (building)
LanguageData.AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.description: \n\n产出：electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark。
LanguageData.WindTurbine.label: wind turbine
LanguageData.WindTurbine.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow. Power output: 1,050 W at maximum wind speed。
LanguageData.WindTurbine_Blueprint.label: wind turbine (blueprint)
LanguageData.WindTurbine_Frame.label: wind turbine (building)
LanguageData.WindTurbine_Frame.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow. Power output: 1,050 W at maximum wind speed。
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine.label: advanced wind turbine
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow。
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Blueprint.label: advanced wind turbine (blueprint)
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.label: advanced wind turbine (building)
LanguageData.AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow。
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.label: steam generator
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.description: The basic Steam Generator that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Ethanol Fuel, Charcoal, Kindling and wooden stuff. Power output: around 750 W。
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator_Blueprint.label: steam generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator_Frame.label: steam generator (building)
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator_Frame.description: The basic Steam Generator that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Ethanol Fuel, Charcoal, Kindling and wooden stuff. Power output: around 750 W。
LanguageData.BioGenerator.label: bio-generator
LanguageData.BioGenerator.description: A bio-generator that produces electricity. Requires Biodiesel for a fuel source. Power output: 1200 W。
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Blueprint.label: bio-generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Blueprint_Install.label: bio-generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Frame.label: bio-generator (building)
LanguageData.BioGenerator_Frame.description: A bio-generator that produces electricity. Requires Biodiesel for a fuel source. Power output: 1200 W。
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant.label: coal power plant
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant.description: The Coal Power Plant that produces electricity by burning coal-like fuels. Can be fueled with Coal Ore or Peat. Power output: 2,000 W。
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Blueprint.label: coal power plant (blueprint)
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Frame.label: coal power plant (building)
LanguageData.CoalPowerPlant_Frame.description: The Coal Power Plant that produces electricity by burning coal-like fuels. Can be fueled with Coal Ore or Peat. Power output: 2,000 W。
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.label: fuel power plant
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.description: A Fuel Power Plant that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Fuel, Prometheum or FSX. Power output: 3,500 W。
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Blueprint.label: fuel power plant (blueprint)
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Frame.label: fuel power plant (building)
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Frame.descripti: A Fuel Power Plant that produces electricity. Can be fueled with Fuel, Prometheum or FSX. Power output: 3,500 W。
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.label: geothermal generator
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.description: \n\n产出：electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser. Power output: 2,500 W。
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Blueprint.label: geothermal generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Frame.label: geothermal generator (building)
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Frame.description: \n\n产出：electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser. Power output: 2,500 W。
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator.label: thermoelectric generator
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator.description: \n\n产出：electricity from differences in temperatures between two rooms. Should be placed in a wall. Example: At 1,600 C (2,912 F) difference, power output is 16,200 W at 600% efficiency。
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Blueprint.label: thermoelectric generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Frame.label: thermoelectric generator (building)
LanguageData.ThermoelectricGenerator_Frame.descriptio: \n\n产出：electricity from differences in temperatures between two rooms. Should be placed in a wall. Example: At 1,600 C (2,912 F) difference, power output is 16,200 W at 600% efficiency。
LanguageData.NPP.label: nuclear power plant
LanguageData.NPP.description: A Nuclear Power Plant with 24,000 W power output. Requires a hopper with Enriched Uranium as a fuel source. WARNING: In case of a nuclear meltdown, build walls around the debris to contain the radiation!
LanguageData.NPP_Blueprint.label: nuclear power plant (blueprint)
LanguageData.NPP_Frame.label: nuclear power plant (building)
LanguageData.NPP_Frame.description: A Nuclear Power Plant with 24,000 W power output. Requires a hopper with Enriched Uranium as a fuel source. WARNING: In case of a nuclear meltdown, build walls around the debris to contain the radiation!
LanguageData.NPPD.label: nuclear power plant debris
LanguageData.NPPD.description: Radioactive debris of a Nuclear Power Plant. Build walls around it to contain the radiation!
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine.label: Gause Wind Turbine
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine.description: A wind-powered gause electrical generator. Please keep all limbs and pets away from the turbine area! Power output: 2250 W at maximum wind speed。
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Blueprint.label: Gause Wind Turbine (blueprint)
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Frame.label: Gause Wind Turbine (building)
LanguageData.GauseWindTurbine_Frame.description: A wind-powered gause electrical generator. Please keep all limbs and pets away from the turbine area! Power output: 2250 W at maximum wind speed。
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower.label: tesla lightning generator
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower.description: Harness the incredible power source of lightning through the invention of Nikola Tesla, the Tesla Lightning Generator! It needs to cool off from time to time when it gets too hot. Power output: 6,000 W。
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Blueprint.label: tesla lightning generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Frame.label: tesla lightning generator (building)
LanguageData.TeslaLigthningPower_Frame.description: Harness the incredible power source of lightning through the invention of Nikola Tesla, the Tesla Lightning Generator! It needs to cool off from time to time when it gets too hot. Power output: 6,000 W。
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant.label: plasma reactor
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant.description: \n\n产出：tax-free electricity from a steam geyser. Must be placed on a steam geyser. A Plasma Generator can be linked to absorb plasma discharges. Requires to be fueled by Tin or Aluminium。
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Blueprint.label: plasma reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Frame.label: plasma reactor (building)
LanguageData.PlasmaGeothermalPlant_Frame.description: \n\n产出：tax-free electricity from a steam geyser. Must be placed on a steam geyser. A Plasma Generator can be linked to absorb plasma discharges. Requires to be fueled by Tin or Aluminium。
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.label: plasma generator
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.description: \n\n产出：tax-free electricity through plasma discharges from a Plasma Reactor. It needs to be fully charged first。
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Blueprint.label: plasma generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Frame.label: plasma generator (building)
LanguageData.PlasmaGen_Frame.description: \n\n产出：tax-free electricity through plasma discharges from a Plasma Reactor. It needs to be fully charged first。
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine.label: xenon-ion turbine
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine.description: Must be placed on a steam geyser. The Xenon-Ion Turbine produces power from extreme heat, and efficiency can go above 100%. Example: At 250 C (482 F) power output is 5,000 W with 150% efficiency。
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Blueprint.label: xenon-ion turbine (blueprint)
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Frame.label: xenon-ion turbine (building)
LanguageData.XenonIonTurbine_Frame.description: Must be placed on a steam geyser. The Xenon-Ion Turbine produces power from extreme heat, and efficiency can go above 100%. Example: At 250 C (482 F) power output is 5,000 W with 150% efficiency。
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor.label: antimatter reactor
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor.description: The contained antimatter separates from normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions. Power output: 32,000 W。
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Blueprint.label: antimatter reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Frame.label: antimatter reactor (building)
LanguageData.AntimatterReactor_Frame.description: The contained antimatter separates from normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions. Power output: 32,000 W。
